==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=驴友}}

===Etymology===
Derived wittily from the homophonic {{zh-l|旅友|lǚyǒu|travel companion}} or heterophonic {{zh-l|旅游|lǚyóu|to travel; travelling}}, utilising the "3rd tone + 3rd tone → 2nd tone + 3rd tone" tone sandhi pattern in the Beijing dialect. Literally: "donkey friend".
